main_topic.author: Lorry Zou
main_topic.title: Does the order of the submission file matter?
main_topic.content:
Title. Is it OK if I change the order of the original submission file?

For example, the original id's are: 01, 02, 03.

Is it OK if I submit in this order: 02|prediction, 01|prediction, 03|prediction ?

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: No it won't matter. I submitted submission.csv files with reversed IDs before.
comments.date: Posted 23 days ago  ·  38th in this Competition
